code: import{Button,Grid,TextField}from"@mui/material";import axios from"axios";import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function UploadImage(){const[tags,setTags]=useState("");const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState();const handleFileChange=event=>{if(event.target.files!=null){setSelectedFile(event.target.files[0]);}};const uploadImage=file=>{if(!file){console.error("No file selected!");return;}const formData=new FormData();formData.append("file",file);formData.append("tags",tags);axios.put("apigateway-api.com/photos",formData,{}).then(response=>{alert("Done");}).catch(response=>{alert("Failed");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,padding:2,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{item:true,xs:4,justifyContent:"right",alignContent:"center",display:"flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{accept:"image/*",type:"file",onChange:handleFileChange,id:"image-upload",style:{display:"none"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,id:"standard-basic",label:"tags",variant:"standard",onChange:event=>{setTags(event.target.value);}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:4,justifyContent:"center",alignContent:"center",display:"flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"image-upload",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"text",component:"span",children:"Choose Image"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:4,justifyContent:"left",alignContent:"center",display:"flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:()=>uploadImage(selectedFile),disabled:!selectedFile,fullWidth:true,children:"Upload Image"})})]})});}
